============================================================
AI RESPONSE
============================================================

\box{incorrect}

Reasoning (brief):
- The 3-digit chunking is wrong. For example, A ends with "...188675" so its rightmost chunk should be 675 (not 435). B ends with "...084690289" so its rightmost chunk should be 289 (not 503). Because the starting chunks are incorrect, all subsequent convolution and carrying are invalid.
- The convolution/buckets therefore do not correspond to the given original numbers and the final recombined product is not a correct product of the two original inputs.
